items.descrText: Right click on this item while in a Town or Hideout to use it.
explicitMods:
Creates a portal to the Rogue Harbour from a Town or Hideout
Used as Currency for services in the Rogue Harbour

items.descrText: These can be brought to Gwennen to refresh her vendor inventory.

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click an unidentified item to apply it.

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it.
explicitMods: Reforges the colour of sockets on an item

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity

explicitMods: A stack of unknown divination cards

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Knocks Enemies Back on Hit
25% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold
+0.2 metres to Melee Strike Range
20% chance to deal Double Damage
items.secDescrText: Attacks enemies with a forceful blow, knocking them back. Requires a Mace, Sceptre, Axe, Sword or Two-Handed Weapon.

items.descrText: Use Intelligence to Reveal additional Wings and Rooms by talking to certain NPCs in the Rogue Harbour. Give this Blueprint to Adiyah to embark on the Grand Heist.
Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: 60% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
5% more Area of Effect per Endurance Charge
+5% fissure branching chance per Endurance Charge
30% fissure branching chance
items.secDescrText: Slam the ground, unleashing a fiery fissure in front of you, dealing area damage and randomly releasing a number of smaller fissures branching off from it. Consume an Endurance Charge every third time you slam the ground with this skill. Requires a Mace, Sceptre, Sword, Axe, Staff, or Unarmed.

items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 35% more Melee Physical Damage
Supported Skills deal 35% more Damage with Bleeding and Poison caused by Melee Hits
Supported Skills have 10% less Attack Speed
items.secDescrText: Supports melee attack skills.

items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal up to 26% more Melee Damage to Enemies, based on proximity

Supported Skills grant Combat Rush on Hit
Combat Rush lasts 2 seconds or until you use a Travel Skill
Combat Rush grants 20% more Attack Speed to Travel Skills not Supported by Close Combat
Supported Skills can only be used with Axes or Swords
items.secDescrText: Supports melee attack skills. Cannot support skills which create minions.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: 25% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold
+0.5 metres to radius
Deals up to 44% more Damage with Hits to closer targets
items.secDescrText: Slams the ground in front of you, creating a wave that travels forward and damages enemies with an increased chance to stun. The wave deals more damage to closer enemies. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

items.descrText: Give this Contract to Adiyah in the Rogue Harbour to embark on the Heist.
explicitMods: 21% increased number of Rare Monsters
Monsters Poison on Hit
Reinforcements have 15% increased Attack Speed
Reinforcements have 19% increased Cast Speed
Reinforcements have 15% increased Movement Speed
Reward Rooms have 24% increased Monsters
Players have 20% less Armour
Players have 20% reduced Chance to Block
flavourText: "One must, as one should, admire the lasting works of those who came before.
The Vaal were the uncontested greatest architects until we,
and Matatl soared above their best."
items.name: Fate Oath

items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Minions from Supported Skills take 40% of their Maximum Life as Fire Damage per second
Minions from Supported Skills deal 15.4 Fire Damage per second to Enemies near them
Minions from Supported Skills deal 3% increased Damage
items.secDescrText: Supports skills which create Minions.

items.descrText: Give this Contract to Adiyah in the Rogue Harbour to embark on the Heist.
explicitMods: Monsters' skills Chain 1 additional times
Monsters are Hexproof
Reward Rooms have 20% increased Monsters
Players gain 20% reduced Flask Charges
flavourText: "I have spent my family's entire fortune in the pursuit of this device.
Assembling it and turning it on is all I have left."
items.name: Corruption Testament

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.
enchantMods: Added Small Passive Skills grant: +15% to Lightning Resistance

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
explicitMods: Minions deal 10% increased Damage
With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Animate Weapon can Animate up to 12 Ranged Weapons
flavourText: Long after the Karui passed through,
the whispers of those who stood their ground
at Lioneye's Watch could be heard amongst the rubble.
items.name: Spirit Guards

items.descrText: Give this Contract to Adiyah in the Rogue Harbour to embark on the Heist.
explicitMods: Monsters have 30% increased Area of Effect
Monsters have 30% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments
Reward Room Monsters deal 16% increased Damage
16% increased Total Heist Fee
flavourText: "The chalice holds certain properties that make scientists quite possessive and irrational.
It's best if you don't ask too many questions about this one."
items.name: Spirit Pledge

items.descrText: Give this Contract to Adiyah in the Rogue Harbour to embark on the Heist.
explicitMods: Monsters have 30% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments
Reinforcements have 10% increased Attack Speed
Reinforcements have 14% increased Cast Speed
Reinforcements have 5% increased Movement Speed
Reward Rooms have 24% increased Monsters
Monsters cannot be Taunted

Monsters' Action Speed cannot be modified to below Base Value
Monsters' Movement Speed cannot be modified to below Base Value
Players have 20% less Recovery Rate of Life and Energy Shield
flavourText: "The Faridun cannot earn burial in the sky.
They have other ways of keeping the dead."
items.name: Beast Deed

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Trap lasts 4.9 seconds
Rotates 4.95 times
25% increased rotation speed if Dual Wielding
Rotates +1 times if Dual Wielding
Base radius is 1.6 metres
items.secDescrText: Throws a trap which, once triggered, swings two copies of your equipped Dagger, Claw or One Handed Sword around it in circles, each repeatedly damaging enemies it spins through.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: 2 to 3 Added Attack Physical Damage
Trigger this Skill when you Block
40% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
items.secDescrText: Perform a deadly counter-attack when you block. Uses both weapons while you're dual wielding.
